text: Thelma Houston (born Thelma Jackson on May 7, 1946) is an American singer and actress. She had a #1 hit with her version of "Don't Leave Me This Way". The song won the Grammy Award for Best Female R&B; Vocal Performance. Houston made guest-star appearances, including Cagney & Lacey and Simon & Simon. She later acted in the movies Beloved and 54. Houston was born in Leland, Mississippi. ==References== Category:Singers from Mississippi Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Thelma Houston
